meanings.definition: Behaving in a nervous or erratic manner.
meanings.sent1: The students were feeling squirrely before the big exam.
meanings.sent2: The cat became squirrely when it heard thunder outside.
meanings.sent3: The squirrely puppy kept running in circles around the yard.
meanings.sent4: Her squirrely behavior made it hard to predict her next move.
meanings.sent5: The squirrely squirrel darted back and forth across the tree branches.

meanings.definition: Full of twists and turns; winding.
meanings.sent1: The squirrely road led us through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The river took a squirrely path through the valley.
meanings.sent3: The squirrely maze in the garden was challenging to navigate.
meanings.sent4: The squirrely plot of the movie kept us guessing until the end.
meanings.sent5: The squirrely vines twisted around the old tree trunk.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a squirrel.
meanings.sent1: Her fluffy tail was so squirrely, just like a squirrel's.
meanings.sent2: The child's quick movements were squirrely, resembling a squirrel's.
meanings.sent3: The squirrely hat with ears made her look like a playful squirrel.
meanings.sent4: His squirrely habits of storing snacks reminded everyone of a squirrel.
meanings.sent5: The squirrely cheeks of the baby made everyone smile.
